example_utterances: No problem, it looks heavy. What classes do you have today?
Ha! Yeah, I know the feeling. I have physics, biology, and Spanish. My backpack is pretty full too.
Don't worry about it. We're classmates and friends, it's what we're supposed to do for each other.
Yeah, I did it. That short story was pretty interesting, I thought.
Hmm, I can see your point. But I thought the author created a really vivid image of the setting.
Yeah, I see what you mean. But at least the homework was finished, right?
Of course. Let's get to class now before we're late!
I'm good. Thanks for asking. I'm just really focused on my goals these days.
Well, I want to go to a good university and study computer science. I hope to get a scholarship too.
Yes, I am! I'm studying really hard, taking advanced classes, and joining some extracurricular activities related to computer science. I'm also saving up for college.
